messages.title: A message from Hull North's Diana Johnson...
messages.content: On 12th December you need to decide who you want as your MP. I’m asking for your vote again to continue being a strong and experienced voice for Hull North. The Tories and Lib Dems have led the biggest and most unfair cuts on Hull and created the national crisis we’re now in.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Proper funding, no to privatisation and dodgy deals with Trump.
Labour’s new Green Deal and the Humber leading the way.
Reverse police cuts, more bobbies on the beat.
Investment in modernising transport links across the North.
Skilled modern jobs and work that pays.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Saving free TV licenses for over-75s
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Saving free TV licenses for over-75s.

issues.environment: Climate change - Labour’s new Green Deal and the Humber leading the way.
issues.health: The NHS – proper funding, no to privatisation and dodgy deals with Trump.
issues.labourEmployment: Decent work in a strong local economy – Skilled modern jobs and work that pays.
issues.lawCrime: Tough on crime – reverse police cuts, more bobbies on the beat.
issues.transport: Investment in modernising transport links across the North.
issues.socialWelfare: Saving free TV licenses for over-75s.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will always stand up for Hull – and for you.
